channel.title: NPC's won't respawn?
channel.description:
I am wondering how do I make NPC's that I have added into NPCspawns.java respawn after being killed etc, they seem to just have 1 life and never respawn until server is reset?
If anyone knows would be a massive help thanks!

item.title: NPC's won't respawn?
item.dc:creator: @James6213 James6213
item.description:
@James6213 wrote:

	World.spawnNPC(51, new WorldTile(1323, 4494, 0), -1, true, true);
	World.spawnNPC(51, new WorldTile(1306, 4489, 0), -1, true, true);
	World.spawnNPC(51, new WorldTile(1289, 4491, 0), -1, true, true);
	World.spawnNPC(51, new WorldTile(1306, 4533, 0), -1, true, true);
	World.spawnNPC(51, new WorldTile(1330, 4527, 0), -1, true, true);

Looks like this

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's won't respawn?
item.dc:creator: @freddie_griner freddie griner
item.description:
@freddie_griner wrote:

ok this might help you need to add a respawn time in npc.java for example

your probably look like this
npc = 0 Hans 0 0

simply click tab 1 more time and add the amount of time u want him to respawn in so like this
npc = 0 Hans 0 0 30
that would make him respawn 30 seconds after he dies if you already have this then idk whats wrong

Read full topic
